original_text: So when I came back here, the Jewish leaders and the leaders of their priests came with me. I did not wait for long. On the next day I sat down on my special seat as judge. I told my soldiers to bring this man to me.
korean_text: 그러므로 그들이 나와 함께 여기 오매 내가 지체하지 아니하고 이튿날 재판 자리에 앉아 명하여 그 사람을 데려왔으나

sentences.original_text: So when I came back here
the Jewish leaders came with me
the leaders of their priests came with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 제사장 지도자들도 나와 함께 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: I did not wait for long
I sat down on my special seat as judge
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 재판관으로서 나의 특별한 자리에 앉았습니다

sentences.original_text: to bring this man to me
